--- title: Tabular learner keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "The function to immediately get a `Learner` ready to train for tabular data" --- 
from nbdev.showdoc import *

Main functions¶

tabular_learner[source]

tabular_learner(dbunch, layers, emb_szs=None, config=None, loss_func=None, opt_func='Adam', lr=slice(None, 0.003, None), splitter='trainable_params', cbs=None, cb_funcs=None, metrics=None, path=None, model_dir='models', wd_bn_bias=False, train_bn=True)

Get a Learner using data, with metrics, including a TabularModel created using the remaining params.

Integration example with training¶

from fastai2.callback.all import *

path = untar_data(URLs.ADULT_SAMPLE)
df = pd.read_csv(path/'adult.csv')

cat_names = ['workclass', 'education', 'marital-status', 'occupation', 'relationship', 'race']
cont_names = ['age', 'fnlwgt', 'education-num']
procs = [Categorify, FillMissing, Normalize]
splits = RandomSplitter()(range_of(df))

to = TabularPandas(df, procs, cat_names, cont_names, y_names="salary", splits=splits)

dbunch = to.databunch(bs=64)
dbunch.show_batch()
workclass education marital-status occupation relationship race age_na fnlwgt_na education-num_na age fnlwgt education-num salary
0 Federal-gov HS-grad Never-married Adm-clerical Own-child White False False False 22.000001 146538.000349 9.0 <50k
1 Private HS-grad Married-civ-spouse Machine-op-inspct Husband White False False False 26.000000 39211.994954 9.0 <50k
2 Self-emp-not-inc Assoc-voc Divorced Sales Not-in-family White False False False 41.000000 284085.997535 11.0 <50k
3 Private Some-college Never-married Exec-managerial Not-in-family White False False False 23.000001 224639.999218 10.0 <50k
4 Private 7th-8th Married-civ-spouse Sales Husband White False False False 61.000000 128230.001466 4.0 >=50k
5 Private Assoc-voc Married-civ-spouse Exec-managerial Wife White False False False 36.000000 115833.997190 11.0 >=50k
6 Self-emp-not-inc Some-college Divorced #na# Not-in-family White False False True 46.000000 245723.997476 10.0 <50k
7 Private Some-college Never-married Craft-repair Own-child White False False False 24.000000 410439.003995 10.0 <50k
8 Private Some-college Divorced Craft-repair Not-in-family Black False False False 50.000000 99391.999219 10.0 <50k
9 Self-emp-not-inc 7th-8th Married-civ-spouse Prof-specialty Husband White False False False 57.000000 275943.001749 4.0 <50k 
learn = tabular_learner(dbunch, [200,100], metrics=accuracy)

learn.fit_one_cycle(1)
